title: Asseyi grabs late winner as West Ham stun Brighton in late comeback
body_text:
Asseyi grabs late winner as West Ham stun Brighton in late comeback
This content is not available in your location.
There was an error
Viviane Asseyi hit a dramatic 91st-minute winner as West Ham scored three times in nine second-half minutes to beat Brighton 3-2 in the Women's Super League.
MATCH REPORT: West Ham 3-2 Brighton
Available to UK users only.
